mapper.select: SELECT g.gdsNum, g.gdsName, g.cateCode, c.cateCodeRef, c.cateName, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes, gdsDate, ImgOriginName, ImgStoredName FROM tbl_goods g INNER JOIN goods_category c ON g.cateCode = c.cateCode WHERE g.cateCode = #{cateCode} OR c.cateCodeRef = #{cateCodeRef}

SELECT g.gdsNum, g.gdsName, g.cateCode, c.cateCodeRef, c.cateName, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes, gdsDate, ImgOriginName, ImgStoredName FROM tbl_goods g INNER JOIN goods_category c ON g.cateCode = c.cateCode WHERE g.cateCode = #{cateCode}

SELECT g.gdsNum, g.gdsName, g.cateCode, c.cateCodeRef, c.cateName, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes, gdsDate,ImgOriginName, ImgStoredName FROM tbl_goods g, goods_category c WHERE g.cateCode = c.cateCode AND g.gdsNum = #{gdsNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_cart (cartNum, member_no, gdsNum, cartStock) VALUES (tbl_cart_seq.nextval, #{member_no}, #{gdsNum}, #{cartStock})
mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY c.cartNum DESC) as num, c.cartNum, c.member_no, g.gdsNum, c.cartStock, c.addDate, g.gdsName, g.gdsPrice, g.ImgOriginName, g.ImgStoredName, g.gdsStock FROM tbl_cart c INNER JOIN tbl_goods g ON c.gdsNum = g.gdsNum WHERE c.member_no = #{member_no}
